short_summary: Request for Proposal to acquire a Weed steamer for the Jasper National Park(RA) Restoration Program
description: The Parks Canada Agency, through its Department of Public Works and Government Services, is soliciting proposals to acquire a Weed steamer to assist with the restoration of non-native vegetation in the Jasper townsite and areas affected by Mountain Pine Beetle kill.
tags: Health, Safety and Environment, Bioremediation and Ecological Restoration and Management
full_summary:
================
# Government Tender Announcement

## 5P423-230127 - Weed Steamer on Trailer

### Tender Details

- **Reference Number**: WS4288758076-Doc4288761242
- **Publication Date**: 2023-11-17
- **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-12-06 at 14:00 EST
- **Amendment Date**: 2023-11-17

### Tender Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services is soliciting bids for a Weed Steamer to assist with the treatment of non-native vegetation in the Jasper townsite and areas affected by wildfire risk reduction activities due to Mountain Pine Beetle kill.

This tender is for a single unit of a weed steamer on a trailer, which will be used as part of a larger Integrated Pest Management Strategy for invasive plant control. The successful bidder will provide a chemical-free treatment option for the end-user, the Parks Canada Agency.

### Requirements

- **Description**: Weed Steamer on a Trailer
- **UNSPSC Code**: *10171700 (Herbicides)
- **Trade Agreements**: *Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### End User Information

- **Name**: Parks Canada Agency (PC)
- **Address**: 30 Victoria Street, Gatineau, Quebec, J8X 0B3, Canada

### Contact Information

- **Name**: Matthew Keenan (SPAC/PSPC)
- **Email**: matthew.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
- **Phone**: None
- **Fax**: None

### Tendering Information

- **Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18042305?extsite=MTgwNDIzMDVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
- **Tender Status**: Expired ( Please Note: The tender closing time has been amended to 2023-12-06 at 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.)

**Important Note:**
All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2023-12-06 at 14:00 EST to be considered for this tender. Please disregard the original closing time.
